languages.text: {n}Глейто вытягивается струной в сторону ящика и скалит клыки, проктор же мрачно впивается взглядом в устройство:{/n} "Серьезно? Впрочем, что еще стоило ожидать от этого отсталого мира..."
{n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто вытягивается струной в сторону ящика и скалит клыки, проктор же мрачно впивается взглядом в устройство:{/n} "Серьезно? Впрочем, что еще стоило ожидать от этого отсталого мира..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito struts toward the box and bares his fangs, while Proctor glares grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? But then again, what else could you expect from this backward world..."
{n}Glaito struts toward the box and bares his fangs, while Proctor glares grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? But then again, what else could you expect from this backward world..."
{n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while the Proctor frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this backward world..."
{n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while the Proctor frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this backward world..."
{n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."
{n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."

languages.text: {n}格雷托朝箱子靠了过去，露出了尖牙。索罗蒙则盯着这个装置，阴沉地皱起了眉头。{/n}“这是在开玩笑吗？但话说回来，这个世界如此愚昧，还能指望什么呢……”
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托朝箱子靠了过去，露出了尖牙。索罗蒙则盯着这个装置，阴沉地皱起了眉头。{/n}“这是在开玩笑吗？但话说回来，这个世界如此愚昧，还能指望什么呢……”

languages.text: {n}グライトは箱に向かって歩み寄り、牙を剥いた。その一方で、ソロモーンはその装置を険しい表情でにらみつけていた。{/n}「本当か？とはいえ…この無知な世界に何を期待できるというんだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトは箱に向かって歩み寄り、牙を剥いた。その一方で、ソロモーンはその装置を険しい表情でにらみつけていた。{/n}「本当か？とはいえ…この無知な世界に何を期待できるというんだ…」

languages.text: {n}Glaito se acerca lentamente a la caja enseñando los colmillos mientras Solomorne observa el artilugio con el ceño fruncido:{/n} «¿De verdad? Por otro lado, qué otra cosa cabe esperar de este mundo ignorante...».
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito se acerca lentamente a la caja enseñando los colmillos mientras Solomorne observa el artilugio con el ceño fruncido:{/n} «¿De verdad? Por otro lado, qué otra cosa cabe esperar de este mundo ignorante...».

languages.text: {n}Glaito, kutuya doğru sinsice yaklaşıp dişlerini gösterirken Solomorne da kaşlarını sertçe çatıyor.{/n} "Yok artık. Gerçi bu cahil dünyadan başka ne beklenebilirdi ki..."
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito, kutuya doğru sinsice yaklaşıp dişlerini gösterirken Solomorne da kaşlarını sertçe çatıyor.{/n} "Yok artık. Gerçi bu cahil dünyadan başka ne beklenebilirdi ki..."

languages.text: {n}Glaito s'approche de la caisse en retroussant les babines, tandis que Solomorne observe l'appareil d'une mine sombre.{/n} « Une supercherie ? Plus rien ne peut me surprendre sur ce monde attardé... »
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito s'approche de la caisse en retroussant les babines, tandis que Solomorne observe l'appareil d'une mine sombre.{/n} « Une supercherie ? Plus rien ne peut me surprendre sur ce monde attardé... »

languages.text: {n}Glaito geht auf die Kiste zu und fletscht seine Zähne, während Solomorne das Gerät grimmig mustert.{/n} "Echt jetzt? Andererseits ... was soll man von dieser ignoranten Welt auch anderes erwarten?"
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stalks toward the box and bares his fangs, while Solomorne frowns grimly at the device:{/n} "Really? Then again, what else could you expect from this ignorant world..."
